form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, Form Number: NSN 7540-00--139-005b

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 PLACE Drs Anderson & Partners MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS 501 Prince's Building, Hong Kong FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) 12/04/91 CITY At the request of the American Consul at COUNTRY HONG KONG B.C.C. NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX LEE FONG WAI CHING (Mo., Day, Yr.) I certify that on the above date I examined F M 08/21/14 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 03/16/90 CI-B891919(A HONG KONG GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, XXXXXXNot Infectious Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphills, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal XX Abnormal Not Done Reaction mm Describe findings: Fibrotic lesions right apex. Not Done Not Done *** Calcification in aortic arch noted. DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DR. F.K. INNES, M. B. CH. B. DATE READ Drs. Anderson & Partners 12/04/91 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: V.D.R.L. Nonreactive HIV Elisa Test Negative DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY DR. F.K. INNES, M. B. CH. B. 12/04/91 DR. F.K. INNES, M.B.CH.B. 1 12/04/91 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS Class B2-Tuberculosis, Not Clinically active, not infectious. 3 consecutive AFB smears negative. *Age 77: Mentally alert. No incontinence. No need for support. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. LEE FONG WAI CHING + 4 DE 91 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DR. F.K. INNES M. B. CH. B. g DATE Drs Anderson & Partners 12/04/91 NSN 7540-00-139--0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 REVISED 2-88 U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE:19880-218-275 DEPT. OF STATE
